title: Atlanta DA Opposed Indicting Cop City Legal Observer, but Georgia Attorney General Pushed Charges Anyway
description:
A Cop City legal observer, who was wearing bright green clothing, was charged with domestic terrorism over objections of Atlanta DA.

The post Atlanta DA Opposed Indicting Cop City Legal Observer, but Georgia Attorney General Pushed Charges Anyway appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Turkish Elections: Erdogan’s Autocracy Continues
description:
Turkish analyst Gönül Tol discusses how, despite economic and social problems, Erdogan won the recent elections.

The post Turkish Elections: Erdogan’s Autocracy Continues appeared first on The Intercept.
